retriever.app.images module¶

Embedded icons.

retriever.app.logo module¶

retriever.app.main module¶

EcoData Retriever UI

This module contains the UI elements of the EcoData Retriever platform.

The application can be started by running the launch_app function with a list of Category objects.

retriever.app.main.launch_app(lists)[source]¶

Launches the application GUI.
